full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: W0142-24X007 Chemical Toilets**
=============================================

**Tender Information**
--------------------

* **Reference Number:** WS4382977540-Doc4383006901
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4382977540
* **Publication Date:** February 2, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 13, 2024, 14:00 EST
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Request for Proposal**
------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposers to provide rental and service of portable chemical toilets, hand wash stations, and grey water tanks in support of a unit at Canadian Forces Base Suffield (CFB Suffield), Ralston, Alberta. The proposed contract is for a period of one year, with an option to extend for two additional one-year periods.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The scope of work includes providing all expertise, transportation, labor, and materials required to meet the needs of the unit. The contractor must be compliant with all requirements specified in the Annex Mandatory Technical Criteria.

**Mandatory Technical Criteria**
-------------------------------

The contractor must meet the following requirements:

* Provide portable chemical toilets, hand wash stations, and grey water tanks as specified in the Annex Basis of Payment
* Comply with all safety regulations and protocols
* Meet or exceed all performance and quality standards

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

This procurement is conducted through a competitive bidding process, with a selection of a single contractor based on the evaluation of proposals. The evaluation criteria include variations or combinations of the above methods.

**Trade Agreements**
--------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**
------------------------

For more information, contact:

* Willy Zumbado Diaz, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: [willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
